name: SpellFinder
description:
Play as a wizard in a dead world,  trying to recover the lost knowledge of the words of power. Chain these words together to create a myriad of different spells and effects.

Controlls:
Movement: WASD
Spell input: hold SHIFT
Interacting with objects: hold SHIFT and write either TOUCH or READ

Game makers:
Jēkabs Vanags (Taka) - game concept and programming
Krišjānis Vanags (KoraSona) - level design and monster sprites
